app.title: Dynamic QR
app.description: Create and manage dynamic QR codes with analytics
app.tagline: Manage your QR codes with ease

validation.email: Please enter a valid email address

password.min: Password must be at least {min} characters
password.complexity: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one number

name.max: Name must be less than {max} characters
name.invalid: Name can only contain letters, spaces, hyphens, and apostrophes

organization.nameMax: Organization name must be less than {max} characters

layout.title: Dashboard | Dynamic QR
layout.description: Manage your QR codes and view analytics

accessDenied.title: Access Denied
accessDenied.defaultDescription: You don't have permission to access this resource. It may belong to a different organization.

notFound.title: Not Found
notFound.defaultDescription: The resource you're looking for doesn't exist or may have been deleted.

generic.title: Something went wrong
generic.description: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.

layout.title: Authentication | Dynamic QR
layout.description: Sign in or create an account to access Dynamic QR features

signIn.title: Sign in
signIn.description: Enter your email and password to sign in to your account

signUp.title: Sign up
signUp.description: Create a new account to get started with Dynamic QR

signUp.emailVerify: Account created! Check your email to verify your address.
signUp.setupError: Failed to set up your account

page.title: Analytics
page.description: Track total scans, daily activity, and top sources. We’re polishing the dashboards and charts.

page.title: Settings
page.description: Manage your profile, organization, and billing. Sections are being built out.

page.title: Profile Settings
page.description: Update your name, email, and personal preferences.

page.title: Billing
page.description: Manage your plan, payment method, and invoices.

index.title: Your QR Codes
index.description: We’re building the list view. In the meantime, you can create a new dynamic QR and start using it right away.
index.emptyDescription: Create your first QR code to get started.
index.loadMoreErrorDescription: Something went wrong while fetching the next page.

create.title: Create New QR Code
create.description: Generate a dynamic QR code that redirects to your target URL

details.metadataDescription: View and download your QR code assets

create.heading: QR Code Details
create.description: Enter the details for your new QR code. It will redirect users to your target URL.

error.unauthorized: You do not have permission to create QR codes.
error.generic: Failed to create QR code. Please try again.

edit.heading: Edit QR Code
edit.description: Update the details for this QR code and publish a new version.

error.unauthorized: You do not have permission to update this QR code.
error.notFound: We couldn't find that QR code.
error.generic: Failed to update QR code. Please try again.

page.notFoundDescription: We couldn’t load this QR code.
page.subtitle: QR details and asset downloads

linkSection.openTargetAria: Open target URL in new tab

root.metadataDescription: QR code redirect service - no slug provided

root.noSlugDescription: No redirect slug provided. Please provide a valid QR code slug.

reasons.malformed: The QR code link is malformed
reasons.directAccess: You're accessing the redirect service directly

slug.metadataDescription: Redirecting to target URL for QR code: {slug}
